content: this headband pattern is both cute and cozy the stranded knitting provides a thick double-layer of protection for your ears and hands in bouts of chilly weather the pattern is fun but not too complicated perfect for both beginners and more advanced knitters **sizing** i have provided instructions for 3 sizes for which the finished headband is 16 /40 5cm 18 /46cm 22 /56 cm in circumference you should choose a size that will give 2-3 /5-7 5cm negative ease so that the headband will hold onto your head snugly the headband is 4 5 /11 4cm tall **yarn** worsted-weight yarn 30-60 m 35-65 yds main color background 30-50 m 55-55 yds contrasting color flowers the pattern also includes tips and tricks for stranded knitter beginners > share your projects on instagram with #winterflowerheadband or @wee_ewe_knits i love to see your pics ♥️
